Back To Recipes

recipe

Ingredients

Ziti 16 ounce
Water 6 cup
Italian Sausage 16 ounce
Spaghetti Sauce 16 ounce
Red Onion 1 unit and wash
4 Garlic Cloves 4 unit
Ricotta Cheese 15 ounce
Mozzarella Cheese 8 ounce
Parmessan Cheese 3 ounce
Olive Oil 1 Tbsp

350 calories (Ziti/Italian Sausage/Red Onion/Garlic Clove/Ricotta Cheese/Mozzarella Cheese/Parmessan Cheese Data Missing)

1575 sodium (Ziti/Italian Sausage/Red Onion/Garlic Clove/Ricotta Cheese/Mozzarella Cheese/Parmessan Cheese Data Missing)

0 cost (Ziti/Italian Sausage/Spaghetti Sauce/Red Onion/Garlic Clove/Ricotta Cheese/Mozzarella Cheese/Parmessan Cheese/Olive Oil Data Missing)

0 sugar (Ziti/Italian Sausage/Spaghetti Sauce/Red Onion/Garlic Clove/Ricotta Cheese/Mozzarella Cheese/Parmessan Cheese/Olive Oil Data Missing)

0 protein (Ziti/Italian Sausage/Spaghetti Sauce/Red Onion/Garlic Clove/Ricotta Cheese/Mozzarella Cheese/Parmessan Cheese/Olive Oil Data Missing)

Recipe

Estimated Time: 50 Minutes

Put 6 cups Water (1.5 quarts) in pot
Timer 10 minutes Boil water on heat 7 with lid
Put in 16 ounces Ziti in water
Put in 1 Tbsp Olive Oil in water
Async 3 minutes Put sauce pan on heat 7 on another burner
     |- mince 4 Garlic Cloves Red Onion
Put 16 ounces Italian Sausage into pan
Async 5 minutes Cook sausage
     |- Put in Garlic Clove and Red Onion
Async 5 minutes Cook pan mixture
     |- Preheat oven to 350
Put in italian seasoning into pan mixture
Timer 1 minute Cook pan mixture
Put 16 ounces Spaghetti Sauce into pan mixture
Timer 1 minute Cook pan mixture
     |- Drain noodles
Spread a thin layer of the sauce in the bottom of a 9x13-inch casserole pan
Dot the surface with half the 8 ounces Ricotta Cheese
Put a spoonful of sauce into the pasta, stir, and then add the pasta into the casserole.
Pour the rest of the sauce over the pasta, dot the remaining 7 ounces Ricotta Cheese over the pasta, and sprinkle 8 ounces Mozzarella Cheese 3 ounces Parmessan Cheese on top.
At this point you could refrigerate or freeze, or bake
Timer 25 minutes Bake in oven until light brown and cheese is melted
